Bond [i]({T}: Until end of turn, target nonbonded creature adds this creature’s base power and toughness to its own, gains the following ability, and becomes bonded. Activate only as a sorcery.)[/i]
Whenever this creature attacks, each other creature you control that shares a creature type with it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
notes: 2.2.0: Text adjusted in line with bond being a sorcery speed affair now.
